#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Contribute to the Story Project
#Text=The Story Project is non-profit organization that fosters reading , writing and communication skills in middle schools .
#Text=If you look around , there are so many that seem to complain that they feel alone in the world and misunderstood .
#Text=Some feel unloved and abandoned , or uncared for .
#Text=The story project is here to make that difference .
#Text=You can be a part of that difference !
#Text=Steps
#Text=Look approachable .
#Text=Have a smile on your face .
#Text=Be presentable , focused , and calm .
#Text=Try smiling with your eyes .
#Text=Be aware of your body language and look open and understanding by uncrossing your arms and keeping a genuine gaze .
#Text=Ask “ what is your story ? ”
#Text=This question comes across as very powerful .
#Text=As human beings , we often wonder if anyone is interested in knowing who we truly are .
#Text=With the stereotypes we have , so many get lost in this image .
#Text=Those 4 words are the most amazing words you can say to someone .
#Text=It shows how much you care .
#Text=These “ life stories ” are extremely powerful gifts and tools .
#Text=They show how everything fits together in life to create this bigger picture .
#Text=They reveal what truly matters .
#Text=They can give comfort and support .
#Text=Looking back on the lives we have , with every detail of our life , feelings , and beliefs , and everything that ever happened to us , it ’s all so beautiful .
#Text=Just combining those things together to make a person shows us how empowered we can become .
#Text=We can learn so much from each other .
#Text=We can learn love , acceptance , and peace when we are at peace with ourselves and everyone around us .
#Text=Do your part and ask a simple question .
#Text=You might just make someone ’s day .
#Text=Be prepared to listen .
#Text=Attend the conversation by leaning slightly foreword while listening , keep your hands and feet quiet and still , and look interested ( and be interested ) , nodding at the appropriate times .
#Text=Keep sufficient eye contact .
#Text=Look at the person , however , avoid staring .
#Text=Offer feedback .
#Text=Repeat what the other person is saying in your own words .
#Text=Do not do this for every sentence .
#Text=Act natural while following your heart .
#Text=Look and be comfortable , and the other person will as well .
#Text=Put yourself in the shoes of the other person .
#Text=Avoid judging him or her .
#Text=Evaluate .
#Text=Look at the prospect of the life story of the person .
#Text=Take the lessons that need be learned from the story , as well as the person .
#Text=Identify the strengths of him or her and compliment accordingly .
#Text=Thank them for sharing .
#Text=Be prepared to share your story .
#Text=The story project is about sharing .
#Text=It means making someone feel understood and less alone in the world .

#Text=In order to accomplish this , it is important to understand the other person by listening and being attentive ; then sharing some things about yourself and your life , your struggles , and rising above those obstacles .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Do not worry if someone does not share there story .
#Text=Not all persons would feel comfortable doing so .
#Text=Do not hesitate to ask .
